name: Dove Foundation
briefDescription: We are a youth led NGO working with and for youth and young people in India. We aim to strengthen youth engagement and leadership  in National & Regional responses  for better health and rights of  youth and young people.Through our various programs we have reached 'directly' to a population of 15,000 young people, youth and children for capacity building initiatives,mobilization particularly for issues concerning their health, education and employment. Our areas of work include HIV/AIDS, ARSH, Maternal & Child Health and Employment Generation through skill building.
